0411:00af ([http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1363224 appears to be used])
0411:00b1 "WUBA-172AG_V00" and "ENG-C06-3300R" appears to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. [[Category:English Documentation]]
